title: Which process(es) have a negative delta S value

content.prompt:
For which of the following processes would ΔS have a negative value?

I. 2 Fe2O3(s) → 4 Fe(s) + 3 O2(g)

II. Mg2+ + 2 OH- → Mg(OH)2(s)

III. H2(g) + C2H4(g) → C2H6(g)

skill.text: 4.A: Predict and/or explain chemical properties or phenomena (e.g., of atoms or molecules) using given chemical theories, models, and representations.
